    • updateTags

      public void updateTags (Question q, List<String> tags, User u) throws NoRightException
      Examines the difference between bound Tags to Question and the given list of Tags and updates Question according to that. If the Tag doesn't exist, it will be created.
      Parameters:
      q -
      tags -
      Throws:
      NoRightException

    • getQuestionPagedFromList

      public List<Question> getQuestionPagedFromList (int indexOfPage, int pageSize, List<Question> questions)
      Paginates results
      Parameters:
      indexOfPage - Index of the desired page, starts with 0.
      pageSize - Desired size of a page
      questions - Source list to paginate
      Returns:
      Returns with the list of results on the page determined by the parameters, returns null if indexOfPage or pageSize is invalid

      questions -
      Returns:
      The maximum number of pages with the given pageSize on the given list.

    • search

      public List<Question> search (String term, String searchType)
      Parameters:
      term -
      searchType -
      Returns:
      A list of Questions matching the search criteria. An empty list, if no results were found, null is searchType is invalid

    • filterByTags

      public List<Question> filterByTags (List<Question> questions, List<String> tags)
      Returns a list with the Questions which have all tags from the tags list. If the tags list is empty, returns Questions without any tags.
      Parameters:
      questions -
      tags -
      Returns:
